3 PlaneDetector::PlaneDetector(ros::NodeHandle* node, string name, string topic_in)
4 {
5  this->name = name;
6  string topic_out = "/calib/planes/" + this->name;
7  this->node = node;
8  this->tf_listener = new tf::TransformListener;
9  this->sub = this->node->subscribe(topic_in, 1, &PlaneDetector::update, this);
10  this->pub_planes_col = this->node->advertise<pc_msg_t>(topic_out + "/color", 1);
11  this->pub_planes = this->node->advertise<calib::Planes>(topic_out + "/planes", 1);
12 
13  this->param_plane.max_it = 1000;
14  this->frame = "cam_center";
15 
16  this->seg.setOptimizeCoefficients(true);
17  this->seg.setModelType(pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
18 }
19 
20 void PlaneDetector::conf_callback(calib::PlaneConfig &config, uint32_t level)
21 {
22  if (config.enable)
23  {
24  this->param_plane.method = 0;
25  }
26  else
27  {
28  this->param_plane.method = -1;
29  }
30  this->param_plane.n_planes = config.n_planes;
31  this->param_plane.th_dist = config.th_dist / 1000;
32  this->subsize = config.subsize / 1000;
33 }
34 
35 void PlaneDetector::update(const pcConstPtr& input)
36 {
37  pc_t* cloud(new pc_t(*input));
38  pcPtr cloudPtr(cloud);
39  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(this->frame, *cloud, *cloud, *this->tf_listener);
40  this->detect_plane(cloudPtr, this->param_plane);
41 }
42 
43 /*
44  * @brief Apply a voxel filter to the point cloud.
45  *
46  * @param input Input cloud.
47  * @param params Filter parameters.
48  */
49 pcPtr PlaneDetector::subsample(const pcPtr& input, param_voxel_t params)
50 {
51  if (params.enable && input->points.size() > 0)
52  {
53  this->filter_voxel.setInputCloud(input);
54  this->filter_voxel.setLeafSize(params.x, params.y, params.z);
55  pc_t* cloud = new pc_t;
56  this->filter_voxel.filter(*cloud);
57  pcPtr output(cloud);
58  if (output->points.size() > 0)
59  {
60  return output;
61  }
62  else
63  {
64  return input;
65  }
66  }
67  else
68  {
69  return input;
70  }
71 }
72 
73 /*
74 * @brief Detect planes in a point cloud and publish a segmented point cloud.
75 *
76 * @param input Input point cloud.
77 * @param params Plane detection parameters.
78 */
79 void PlaneDetector::detect_plane(const pcPtr& input, param_plane_t params)
80 {
81  if (params.method >= 0 && params.n_planes && params.th_dist >= 0 && params.max_it > 0 && input->points.size() > 0)
82  {
83  seg.setMethodType(params.method);
84  this->seg.setMaxIterations(params.max_it);
85  this->seg.setDistanceThreshold (params.th_dist);
86  pcPtr remaining(new pc_t);
87  remaining = this->subsample(input, {true, this->subsize, this->subsize, this->subsize});
88  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(remaining->points.size() << " points remaining after downsampling");
89  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients(new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
90  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers(new pcl::PointIndices);
91  calib::Planes msg;
92  shape_msgs::Plane plane_eq;
93  pc_msg_t color_cloud;
94  pc_msg_t temp_msg;
95  pcPtr temp_cloud(new pc_t);
96  pcl::toROSMsg(*input, temp_msg);
97  msg.point_cloud = temp_msg;
98  for (int i = 0; i < params.n_planes; i++)
99  {
100  this->seg.setInputCloud(remaining);
101  this->seg.segment(*inliers, *coefficients);
102 
103  this->extract.setInputCloud(remaining);
104  this->extract.setIndices(inliers);
105  this->extract.setNegative(false);
106  this->extract.filter(*temp_cloud);
107 
108  colorize(temp_cloud, (float)i / (float)params.n_planes);
109  pcl::toROSMsg(*temp_cloud, temp_msg);
110  msg.clouds.push_back(temp_msg);
111  msg.header = temp_msg.header;
112  pcl::concatenatePointCloud(color_cloud, temp_msg, color_cloud);
113  this->extract.setInputCloud(remaining);
114  this->extract.setIndices(inliers);
115  this->extract.setNegative(true);
116  this->extract.filter(*remaining);
117  plane_eq.coef = {coefficients->values[0], coefficients->values[1], coefficients->values[2], coefficients->values[3]};
118  msg.planes.push_back(plane_eq);
119  }
120  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Publishing " << msg.clouds.size() << " planes.");
121  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Publishing colored point cloud (" << color_cloud.data.size() << " points).");
122 
123  string pub_frame;
124  ros::param::param<string>("/calib/" + this->name + "/cloud/frame_pub", pub_frame, "world");
125  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(pub_frame, color_cloud, color_cloud, *this->tf_listener);
126  this->pub_planes_col.publish(color_cloud);
127  this->pub_planes.publish(msg);
128  }
129 }
